Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceancrest Avenue, just north of the Bushman Farms orchard.
Room.LongDescription: Behind the fence enclosing the Bushman Farms estate, you can see nearly every known fruit tree imaginable, and possibly a few that you've not seen before. On the north side of the road is a large complex. There appears to be a large general store in the plaza named "Madeline's All Purpose Shop of Wares". The entrance to the plaza is located on the opposite side of the building.
